Class CompositeDrawable.CompositeDrawableDrawNode

Namespace
osu.Framework.Graphics.Containers
Assembly
osu.Framework.dll

A draw node responsible for rendering a CompositeDrawable and the DrawNodes of its children.

protected class CompositeDrawable.CompositeDrawableDrawNode : DrawNode, IDisposable, ICompositeDrawNode

Properties

AddChildDrawNodes

Whether Children should be updated by the parenting CompositeDrawable.

public virtual bool AddChildDrawNodes { get; }

Property Value

bool

CanDrawOpaqueInterior

Whether this DrawNode can draw a opaque interior. DrawOpaqueInterior(IRenderer) will only be invoked if this value is 

true
. Should not return 
true
if DrawOpaqueInterior(IRenderer) will result in a no-op. 
protected override bool CanDrawOpaqueInterior { get; }

Property Value

bool

Children

The DrawNodes of the children of our CompositeDrawable.

public List<DrawNode> Children { get; set; }

Property Value

List<DrawNode>

HasOwnOpaqueInterior

Whether this DrawNode has its own opaque interior. If false, a child of the DrawNode may be the source of the opaque interior.

protected override bool HasOwnOpaqueInterior { get; }

Property Value

bool

Shader

The IShader to use for rendering.

protected IShader Shader { get; }

IShader

Source 

protected CompositeDrawable Source { get; }

CompositeDrawable

Methods

ApplyState()

Applies the state of Source to this DrawNode for use in rendering. The applied state must remain immutable.

public override void ApplyState()

Dispose(bool) 

protected override void Dispose(bool isDisposing)

Parameters

isDisposing bool

Draw(IRenderer)

Draws this DrawNode to the screen.

protected override void Draw(IRenderer renderer)

Parameters

renderer IRenderer

The renderer to draw with.

Remarks

Subclasses must invoke 

base.Draw()
prior to drawing vertices.

DrawOpaqueInterior(IRenderer)

Draws the opaque interior of this DrawNode to the screen, if CanDrawOpaqueInterior indicates that an opaque interior can be drawn. The opaque interior must be a fully-opaque, non-blended area of this DrawNode, clipped to the current masking area via 

DrawClipped()
. See SpriteDrawNode for an example implementation. 
protected override void DrawOpaqueInterior(IRenderer renderer)

Parameters

renderer IRenderer

The renderer to draw with.

Remarks

Subclasses must invoke 

base.DrawOpaqueInterior()
prior to drawing vertices.
